{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=EW-7203 |revision=APg |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/01/2004 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM,unknown |type=access point |fcc_id=NDD9572030410 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8515 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model=SST39VF800A-70-4C-EK |ram1=8 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8515 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8000 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=Admin |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=175&pl1_id=25&pl2_id=48 Product page] :[http://www.edimax.at/download/manual/EW-7203APg_M.pdf Manual]
"1244-00000340-010" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The datasheet states the RF chip is 88W8000G.
Identical models (according to the FCC test report)... *[[Edimax EW-7202APg]] :GLP GAP-E02g :GLP GAP-E03g *[[Edimax EW-7206APg]]
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''default'''.
